name: PLE Ventas
query:
SELECT
	CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(posting_date,'%%Y%%m'),'00') as "PERIODO[1]:Data:100",
	REPLACE(sales_invoice.name, '-', '') as "NUMERO CORRELATIVO O CODIGO UNICO DE LA OPERACIÓN[2]:Data:100",
	'M1' as "SECUENCIA[3]:Data:100",
	DATE_FORMAT(posting_date,'%%d/%%m/%%Y') as "FECHA DE EMISIÓN DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO O DOCUMENTO[4]:Data:120",
	DATE_FORMAT(posting_date,'%%d/%%m/%%Y') as "FECHA DE VENCIMIENTO O FECHA DE PAGO[5]:Data:120",
	IF(LENGTH(codigo_comprobante) = 1,CONCAT('0',codigo_comprobante), codigo_comprobante) as "TIPO DE COMPROBANTE DE PAGO O DOCUMENTO[6]:Link/Tipos de Comprobante:100",
	SUBSTRING(sales_invoice.name,4,4) as "SERIE DE COMPROBANTE DE PAGO O DOCUMENTO[7]:Data:150",
	SUBSTRING(sales_invoice.name,9) as "NUMERO DE COMPROBANTE DE PAGO O DOCUMENTO[8]:Data",
	"" as "PARA EFECTOS DEL REGISTRO DE TICKETS O CINTAS EMITIDOS POR MAQUINAS REGISTRADORAS[9]:Data:150",
	IF(base_net_total>700,codigo_tipo_documento,IF(ISNULL(tax_id),"",IFNULL(codigo_tipo_documento,""))) as "TIPO DOC. IDENTIDAD CLIENTE[10]:Field/Tipos de Documento de Identidad:100",
	IF(codigo_tipo_documento=7,IF(SUBSTRING(REPLACE(tax_id,"-",""),-12)="",tax_id, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(tax_id,"-",""),-12)),IF(base_net_total>700,tax_id,IF(ISNULL(tax_id),"",tax_id))) as "NUMERO DOC. IDENTIDAD CLIENTE[11]:Data:100",
	IF(base_net_total>700,customer_name,IF(ISNULL(tax_id),"",IF(customer_name='Clientes Varios',customer_boleta_name,customer_name))) as "APELLIDOS Y NOMBRES DENOMINACION O RAZÓN SOCIAL CLIENTE[12]:Data:100",
	"" as "VALOR FACTURADO DE LA EXPORTACION[13]:Data:400",
	base_net_total as "BASE IMPONIBLE DE LA OPERACIÓN GRAVADA[14]:Float:120",
	"" as "DESCUENTO DE LA BASE IMPONIBLE[15]:Float:120",
	base_total_taxes_and_charges as "IMPUESTO GENERAL A LAS VENTAS Y/O IMPUESTO DE PROMOCION MUNICIPAL[16]:Float:120",
	"" as "DESCUENTO DEL IMPUESTO GENERAL A LAS VENTAS Y/O IMPUESTO DE PROMOCION MUNICIPAL[17]:Float:120",
	"" as "IMPORTE TOTAL DE LA OPERACIÓN EXONERADA[18]:Float:100",
	"" as "IMPORTE TOTAL DE LA OPERACIÓN INAFECTA[19]:Float:100",
	"" as "IMPUESTO SELECTIVO AL CONSUMO[20]:Float:100",
	"" as "BASE IMPONIBLE DE LA OPERACION GRAVADA VENTAS ARROZ PILADO[21]:Float:100",
	"" as "IMPUESTO A LAS VENTAS ARROZ PILADO[22]:Float:100",	
	"" as "OTROS TRIBUTOS Y CARGOS QUE NO FORMAN PARTE DE LA BASE IMPONIBLE[23]:Float:100",		
	base_grand_total as "IMPORTE TOTAL DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO[24]:Float:120",
	IF(currency = 'SOL', 'PEN', currency) as "MONEDA[25]:Link/Currency",
	SUBSTRING(conversion_rate,1,POSITION('.' in conversion_rate)+3) as "TIPO DE CAMBIO[26]:Float:120",
	IF(is_return,(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sales_return.posting_date,'%%d/%%m/%%Y') FROM `tabSales Invoice` as sales_return WHERE sales_return.name=sales_invoice.return_against),"") as "FECHA DE REF. DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO  O DOCUMENTO  MODIFICADO[27]:Data:120",
	IF(is_return,(SELECT sales_return.codigo_comprobante FROM `tabSales Invoice` as sales_return WHERE sales_return.name=sales_invoice.return_against),"") as "TIPO DE REF. DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO  O DOCUMENTO MODIFICADO[28]:Link/Tipos de Comprobante:100",
	IF(is_return,SUBSTRING((SELECT sales_return.name FROM `tabSales Invoice` as sales_return WHERE sales_return.name=sales_invoice.return_against),4,4),"") as "SERIE DE REF. DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO  O DOCUMENTO MODIFICADO[29]:Data:100",
	IF(is_return,SUBSTRING((SELECT sales_return.name FROM `tabSales Invoice` as sales_return WHERE sales_return.name=sales_invoice.return_against),9),"")  as "NUMERO DE REF. DEL COMPROBANTE DE PAGO  O DOCUMENTO MODIFICADO[30]:Data:100",
	"" as "IDENTIFICACION DEL CONTRATO O PROYECTO (JOINT VENTURES)[31]:Data:100",
	"" as "ERROR 1: INCONSISTENCIA EN EL TIPO DE CAMBIO[32]:Data:100",
	'1' as "INDICADOR DE COMPROBANTES DE PAGO CANCELADOS CON MEDIOS DE PAGO[33]:Data:100",
	IF(sales_invoice.docstatus='2','2',IF(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(posting_date,'%%Y-%%m'),'-01')>=posting_date,'7','1')) as "ESTADO[34]:Data:100"
			from
				`tabSales Invoice` as sales_invoice
			where posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
			and posting_date <= %(to_date)s
            		and docstatus != 0
			order by posting_date
